name: .APKM File Extension
summary: Learn about .APKM files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can install the app contained within an APKM file using APKMirror Installer (Android). To do so, download APKMirror Installer and then tap your APKM file. The file will open in APKMirror Installer, allowing you to install the app it contains.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
